entry.title: Our Most Read Stories This Week: Telegram & Stripe Payments; $12M CryptoPunk; Consensys vs. SEC; Renzo Depeg
entry.summary: The Defiant's most read stories for the week of April 22.

entry.title: Bitcoin Layer 2 Stacks Prepares for Nakamoto Upgrade, its Largest Hard-Fork Ever
entry.summary: The network is “transforming into a true Layer-2” said Rena Shah of Trust Machines.

entry.title: Two Vulnerabilities Caught in Optimism Testnet
entry.summary: Offchain Labs found bugs in Optimism's proposed dispute system.

entry.title: Yuga Labs to Restructure and Renew Focus on Otherside
entry.summary: CEO Greg Solano took aim at “labyrinthine corporate processes” in a message to employees.

entry.title: Renzo Updates Airdrop Terms After Explosive ezETH Depeg
entry.summary: Renzo updated its token allocation to Season 1 points farmers by 2%.

entry.title: Ether Inflates After Gas Fees Plummet
entry.summary: Ether's supply is inflating despite Ethereum throughput remaining high

entry.title: Bitcoiners Spend Millions On ‘Buy Bitcoin’ Sign and First Sat Of Halving Block
entry.summary: The ‘Buy Bitcoin’ sign sold for $1 million, while the ‘Epic Sat’ was purchased for a whopping $2.1 million.

entry.title: Consensys Sues SEC In Bid To ‘Defend Ethereum’
entry.summary: “We don’t take this step lightly, but we feel compelled to act,” said founder Joseph Lubin, as the Web3 technology firm seeks to counter regulatory overreach.

entry.title: Payments Giant Stripe Adds Crypto Again Starting With USDC, TechCrunch Reports
entry.summary: The company will reportedly allow for USDC payments on Solana, Ethereum, and Polygon.

entry.title: Franklin Templeton Enables P2P Transfers for BENJI Fund
entry.summary: The asset management firm’s $380 million OnChain U.S. Government Money Fund commands nearly a third of the tokenized Treasuries sector.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Prices Tumble as GDP Data Comes In Weaker Than Expected
entry.summary: The downturn comes as inflows into BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF dry up.

entry.title: Punk 635 Sold for $12M in 4th-Highest CryptoPunk Sale Ever
entry.summary: Punk 635 was bought for 4,000 ETH.

entry.title: Avail Announces Data Availability Integrations With Five Leading L2 Teams
entry.summary: Developers leveraging tech stacks from Arbitrum, Optimism, ZkSync, Polygon, and StarkWare will have access to AvailDA.

entry.title: Chainlink Completes Permissionless Rollout For Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol
entry.summary: CCIP is already generating $6,669 in daily revenue for Chainlink.

entry.title: Frax and PotatoSwap Team Up On OKX’s New L2 X Layer
entry.summary: X Layer went live on mainnet last week.

entry.title: Fantasy.Top Attracts $56 Million Ahead of Mainnet Launch
entry.summary: The Social-Fi card trading game on Blast combines fantasy sports with Crypto Twitter.

entry.title: Feds Arrest Samourai Wallet Founders on Money Laundering Charges
entry.summary: The government alleges the founders knowingly facilitated $2 billion of unlawful transactions and the laundering of $100 million from Silk Road and other black market platforms.

entry.title: Restaking Overtakes Liquid Staking In Monthly Inflows
entry.summary: The biggest winner was EtherFi, while Lido saw $1B+ of outflows.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Trade Lower As Whales Show Signs Of FOMO
entry.summary: Santiment reports that wallets containing 1,000 to 10,000 BTC have accumulated $17 billion worth of Bitcoin in 2024.

entry.title: Reya’s Liquidity Generation Event Attracts $100 Million In Less Than 24 Hours
entry.summary: Reya facilitates shared liquidity among native decentralized exchanges.

entry.title: Renzo’s Restaked ETH Depegs to $700 As Season 1 of Airdrop Ends
entry.summary: The de-peg led to liquidations across DeFi protocols Gearbox and Morpho Labs.

entry.title: Grayscale Seeks SEC Nod To Introduce ‘Mini’ Ethereum ETF
entry.summary: If approved, Grayscale's Ethereum Mini Trust would be seeded with Ether from the Grayscale Ethereum Trust.

entry.title: U.S. Prosecutors Seek Three-Year Sentence For CZ
entry.summary: Department of Justice demands extended sentence for Binance's former CEO, Changpeng Zhao.

entry.title: Bitcoin’s New Runes Protocol Fuels Sky High Transaction Fees
entry.summary: Runestones have dropped 70% after an airdrop snapshot was taken on April 21.

entry.title: Arthur Hayes Says Ordinals ‘Bring Human Culture’ To Oldest Crypto Community
entry.summary: The investor’s fund, Maelstrom, is focused on assets that gave rise to crypto meme culture.

entry.title: Ethereum Ecosystem Activity Soars to All-time High
entry.summary: Weekly active wallets have surpassed 10 million, driven by Base and Polygon.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Stage Relief Rally Ahead of U.S. Economic Data
entry.summary: Key economic indicators this week include GDP and PCE numbers, set for release on Thursday.

entry.title: How Blockchains and Tokens Are Powering the Next Internet Revolution
entry.summary: Hello Defiers! Today, I'm bringing you a very special episode from a session I moderated at SXSW, where I had the opportunity of leading a session with Chris Dixon, a General Partner at Andreessen Horowitz, where we focused on his recent publication, "Read Write Own: Building the Next Era of the Internet." This book is an essential read for anyone looking to grasp the essence of the Web3 movement. Let's dive in!

entry.title: Safe Token Trades at $1.2B Market Cap After Community Votes to Unpause Transfers
entry.summary: A 99% majority vote resulted in the unfreezing of the SAFE token contract for transfers.

entry.title: Metis Introduces Decentralized Sequencer Mining With Phase 2 Rollout
entry.summary: Phase 2 of Metis’ decentralized sequencer rollout introduces rewards for node stakers and operators

entry.title: Millions In ‘Forgotten’ Crypto Lies Dormant On Bridges
entry.summary: Data from Arkham Intelligence shows wallets associated with Vitalik Buterin and Coinbase among the owners of seemingly forgotten bridged assets.

entry.title: PayPal and Energy Web Team Up To Incentivize Green Bitcoin Mining
entry.summary: PayPal believes economic incentives can encourage miners to adopt green energy sources.

entry.title: SEC Attorneys Resign After Agency Sanctioned Over Debt Box Lawsuit
entry.summary: Lead SEC attorneys Michael Welsh and Joseph Watkins reportedly stepped down from the agency.

entry.title: Nobody Is Buying Donald Trump's NFTs – So Melania Decided To Step Up
entry.summary: Various platforms show interest in Trump’s digital trading cards plummet, while the former first lady has launched a new necklace NFT.

entry.title: Tether Partners With Telegram To Bring Crypto Payments To 900 Million Users
entry.summary: Telegram users can now send and withdraw USDT for free.

entry.title: Gambling Platform ZKasino Sends $33M To Lido Instead Of Returning Assets To Investors
entry.summary: Controversy swirls as the project claims hitmen were hired to target the team, which has a dubious past.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Stocks Thrive While Hash Rate Slides Post Halving
entry.summary: Leading mining stocks rallied by more than 17% since Tuesday.

entry.title: Aave Community Votes On Next Network To Host GHO
entry.summary: Avalanche and Arbitrum emerge as front-running candidates to host GHO's second deployment.

entry.title: Arbitrum-based Perpetuals DEX Hyperliquid Crosses $450 Million In TVL
entry.summary: The decentralized exchange has processed more than $150 billion of trades since launching last year.

entry.title: DeFi Protocol Hedgey Finance Suffers $44M Hack
entry.summary: The platform suffered two parallel attacks on Arbitrum and Ethereum.

entry.title: Bitcoin Network Fees Soar as Runes Launch Nears
entry.summary: The hype around the new fungible token standard has reached a fever pitch ahead of the imminent Bitcoin halving.

entry.title: New Stablecoin Bill Draws Mixed Reactions
entry.summary: U.S. Senators Cynthia Lummis and Kristen Gillibrand have introduced new legislation for stablecoin issuers.

entry.title: CoreDAO Brings Native Staking To Bitcoin
entry.summary: The Bitcoin-powered EVM-compatible blockchain enables non-custodial native Bitcoin staking, with rewards paid out in CORE tokens.

entry.title: Optimism Offers $22M in Grants to Superchain Builders
entry.summary: The Optimism Collective is launching its Retro Funding Round 4 on May 23.

entry.title: Google Searches for 'Bitcoin Halving' Hit All-time High
entry.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Dogecoin slide as Wall Street exerts downward pressure on crypto markets.

entry.title: Introduction to DeFi: The Future of Finance | Crypto 101
entry.summary: Welcome back to Crypto 101, your comprehensive guide to all things Crypto, where we break down the complex world of blockchain technology into bite-sized pieces. Today, we're diving straight into decentralized finance, or DeFi for short!

entry.title: Worldcoin Launches Optimism-powered Layer 2 Network
entry.summary: World Chain will leverage the OP stack and offer special perks to verified Worldcoin users.

entry.title: How Real-World Assets Will Survive (and Evolve) in the Bull Market
entry.summary: Projects that prioritize structure, compliance, and decentralization will be best positioned to attract institutional capital and drive the long-term growth of the sector.

entry.title: Layer 2 Scroll zkEVM Introduces Points Program
entry.summary: Users can now earn Scroll Marks by bridging assets to the network.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Take A Plunge Amid Strengthening US Dollar— Could Bitcoin Halving Turn the Tables?
entry.summary: Ahead of its April 20 halving, Bitcoin's value dips as the US dollar strengthens.

entry.title: Ordinals Explorer Ord.io Raises $2M Round Led By Bitcoin Frontier Fund
entry.summary: The funding will go towards expanding the platform’s feature set.

entry.title: Five years of building in DeFi: the story of DeFi Saver
entry.summary: DeFi Saver is a management platform that provides advanced automation options and tools for decentralized finance protocols, enabling users to manage, optimize, and interact with their investments on various blockchain platforms. In our interview with Nenad Palinkasevic, the founder of DeFi Saver, we explore the platform's beginnings, discuss strategies users adopt in different market conditions, delve into their various integrations, and uncover what the future holds for their roadmap.

entry.title: Lido Finance Implements Simple DVT to Increase Ethereum Node Operators
entry.summary: DVT implementation helps ease worries about Lido controlling too much staked ETH.

entry.title: Ordinals Lending Market Heats Up on Ethereum
entry.summary: An $80,000 loan was taken out against a rare Nodemonke last week.

entry.title: EigenLayer Removes Deposit Caps On Liquid Staking Tokens
entry.summary: The move marks the culmination of the Ethereum restaking protocol’s rollout phase.

entry.title: Crypto Markets Crater On Rising Geopolitical Tensions
entry.summary: Most altcoins have plummeted by 30% or more in the past week, while Bitcoin trades at $62,000.

entry.title: Tether CEO Teases Sweeping Tokenization Platform
entry.summary: Paolo Ardoino called it a ‘masterpiece’ but didn’t offer many details.

entry.title: Solana Real Estate Protocol Parcl to Airdrop Token Tomorrow
entry.summary: Parcl will distribute 800M PRCL tokens to early users.

entry.title: Uniswap Raises Swap Fees Days After SEC Warning
entry.summary: The platform has hiked transaction costs to 0.25% from 0.15%.

entry.title: Memecoins, Web3 Social Media, and the Evolution of Token Models with Li Jin
entry.summary: Li Jin is the co-founder and managing partner at Variant Fund, a venture firm that invests in Web3 and the ownership economy. Before founding Variant, Li Jin worked at Andreessen Horowitz where she helped to shape the firm’s views on the emerging tech landscape. In today's discussion, we delve into memecoins, Web3 social media, and the evolving landscape of token models, examining how these elements are shaping the future of digital economies and influencing user interaction in decentralized networks.

entry.title: Solana Rolls Out Update in Bid To End Network Congestion
entry.summary: The network has been under stress in recent months thanks to spam bots and memecoin trading.

entry.title: Nearly 70% of Base Is Used By Project of ‘Questionable’ Utility
entry.summary: XEN is monopolizing most of the network’s resources, as it did in October 2022 on Ethereum.

entry.title: Runestones Wants to Become the Biggest Memecoin Community, Says Creator
entry.summary: The airdropped Runestones collection has soared to become the second most valuable NFT collection after CryptoPunks.

entry.title: Hong Kong Could Approve Bitcoin and Ether ETFs Next Week
entry.summary: Bitcoin ETFs are headed to Asia after their successful U.S. debut, although the territory is likely to approve Ethereum ETFs as well.

entry.title: The SEC Must Lose vs Uniswap; EigenLayer Launch; The Defiant's Memecoin Experiment
entry.summary: Welcome to Crypto With Cami, your concise guide to the week's most significant developments in DeFi and Web3, all in 30 minutes or less.

entry.title: Ethereum Upgrade To Improve Wallets But Unlock New Attacks
entry.summary: EIP-3074 will introduce smart contract functionality for regular Ethereum wallets as part of the Pectra upgrade.

entry.title: Hot New Restaking Project Karak Faces Backlash Over Team’s Past
entry.summary: Karak has been outed as the second reincarnation of Risk Harbor, a protocol accused of running off with millions earmarked as insurance for Terra’s failed UST stablecoin.

entry.title: EigenLayer Launches Six Actively Validated Services
entry.summary: The restaking protocol aims to accelerate rollups, real-world data integration, and co-processors.

entry.title: Pantera-Backed Rollup Omni Network Announces Airdrop
entry.summary: 3% of OMNI’s total supply will be airdropped to EigenLayer restakers, ETH stakers, various NFT holders, and Omni community members.

entry.title: Avalanche vs. The World: Emin Gün Sirer Saw It Coming
entry.summary: Emin Gün Sirer is the founder and CEO of Ava Labs. In our discussion, we explored the blockchain landscape, focusing on Avalanche's role, comparing it with other chains like Solana and Ethereum. We discussed the impact of market trends, the integration of traditional finance with blockchain, and the emergence of sectors like GameFi and SocialFi within the Avalanche ecosystem.

entry.title: Pump.Fun Takes Over Solana Memecoin Scene
entry.summary: The no-code platform allows anyone to create a memecoin in minutes.

entry.title: Chainlink Launches Cross-Chain Bridging App ‘Transporter’
entry.summary: Transporter leverages Chainlink’s Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP), which is enjoying a recent surge in adoption.

entry.title: Marginfi CEO Resigns Amid Points Controversy and SolBlaze Dispute
entry.summary: Marginfi launched a loyalty points campaign last July, but its founder recently vowed to block any plans to airdrop tokens to points holders.

entry.title: Masa Network Launches Marketplace For Tokenized Data To Train AI Models
entry.summary: Users can earn “points” in exchange for securely contributing data to the platform.

entry.title: FriendTech Sees Renewed Interest Ahead Of Anticipated Airdrop
entry.summary: The SocialFi sector is buzzing as Farcaster and Lens Protocol also show a flurry of activity.

entry.title: First 24 Hours of EigenLayer Brings $500M In Delegated Stake As TVL Hits All-Time High
entry.summary: Some major operators have opted in, including Coinbase and Google Cloud.

entry.title: NFT Volumes Climb to 12-Month High Driven by Once Stagnant Bitcoin
entry.summary: Runestones recently flipped Bored Apes to become the second most valuable NFT collection after CryptoPunks.

entry.title: SEC to Sue Uniswap Labs; Team is "Ready to Fight"
entry.summary: Uniswap is prepared to take on the U.S. securities regulator, founder Hayden Adams said.

entry.title: Layer N Launches Testnet, Aims To Host Unified Ecosystem Of Appchains
entry.summary: Layer N said it hosted sustained throughput of 20,000 TPS during closed testnet trials.

entry.title: Liquid Staking Lands On Bitcoin As Layer 2 Race Heats Up
entry.summary: Nomic DAO unveils liquid staking for BTC while Thesis announces the Bitcoin “Economic Layer.”

entry.title: Meet Blend: Stellar’s Modular Liquidity Layer
entry.summary: Script3 is a decentralized finance studio that advances end-to-end strategic DeFi protocols based on market opportunity and demand. In today's interview, we chat with founder Markus Paulson-Luna to gain deeper insight into their mission and plans with building Blend Capital.

entry.title: Analysts Remain Bearish On Ether ETF Prospects Despite SEC Meetings
entry.summary: The SEC met with Ether ETF hopefuls, but discussions reportedly lacked meaningful feedback.

entry.title: Single Entity Controls Keys to Nearly 50% of All Newly Mined Bitcoin
entry.summary: According to industry experts, the custodian in question is Cobo.

entry.title: EigenLayer Launches on Ethereum Mainnet
entry.summary: There is over 4.1 million ETH re-staked on the platform.

entry.title: Fantom Founder Wants To Create a Safer Memecoin Environment
entry.summary: But previous attempts suggest "culture can't be curated," as one community member said.

entry.title: TON Becomes Top 10 Cryptocurrency After 35% Surge
entry.summary: Telegram-linked The Open Network has overtaken Cardano by market capitalization, with its TVL tripling in the past month.

entry.title: Monad Labs Raises $225M in This Year’s Biggest Funding Round
entry.summary: The round was led by Paradigm, and includes MakerDAO’s Rune Christensen and Coinbase Ventures.

entry.title: SilkRoad Foundation Raises Funds For Ulbricht Family After Repurposing Rug-Pull
entry.summary: The organization was founded through a “community takeover” commandeering the SILKROAD memecoin rug-pull.

entry.title: Stacks To Integrate Portal DeFi For Bitcoin To Layer 2 Atomic Swaps
entry.summary: Stacks’ sBTC will support non-custodial cross-chain swaps by integrating with the Portal DEX Network.

entry.title: Airdrop April Continues as Solana NFT Platform Tensor Launches Token
entry.summary: The airdrop is valued at $250 million with TNSR launching at a $2 billion valuation.

entry.title: Markets Rally as Old Holders Are Met By New Money
entry.summary: Bitcoin is back above $71,000, while Ether has rallied above $3,600.

entry.title: Sushi Team Under Fire For Proposed Treasury Takeover
entry.summary: Sushi’s head chef said the proposal seeks to safeguard treasury assets from an ongoing ‘governance attack.’

entry.title: "Really Crazy Stuff Will Happen With AVSs", ether.fi Founder Mike Silagadze
entry.summary: In today's podcast we host Mike Silagadze, founder of ether.fi, an Ethereum restaking protocol, and Nikhil Raghuveera, co-founder of Aethos, a decentralized policy engine being built on EigenLayer. We dive into the use cases that restaking unlocks via Active Validating Services (AVSs) through EigenLayer, shedding light on how this innovation is shaping the ecosystem.

entry.title: MakerDAO Founder Says Having “Rando’s” Participate in Governance Makes DAOs Unpredictable
entry.summary: Rune Christensen was called out for adding USDe as collateral for MakerDAO.

entry.title: Aave Reduces MakerDAO's DAI Collateral After Proposal to Completely Eliminate It
entry.summary: Aave is decreasing DAI loan-to-value (LTV) ratio by 12 percentage points after MakerDAO added Ethena's USDe synthetic dollar as collateral.

entry.title: Do Kwon And Terraform Labs Found Liable For $40 Billion Fraud
entry.summary: The jury voted unanimously against Kwon.

entry.title: “Bots Spam Better Than Humans” Leading To Transaction Failures On Solana
entry.summary: Bots and Bitcoin-like mining are behind the current issues.

entry.title: BlackRock Adds Five New Firms To ETF, Including Goldman Sachs, Citigroup
entry.summary: Other participants include ABN Amro, Citadel, and UBS.

entry.title: BONSAI Memecoin Aims to Becomes De Facto Currency On Lens After $1M Angel Round
entry.summary: The token pumped 30% ahead of the funding announcement.

entry.title: Frax Stakers On Track To Earn $20.8M Annually After Fee Switch Activation
entry.summary: Frax will distribute nearly $400,000 to veFXS stakers this week.
